display_long_description:
SWARM 2, the highly anticipated sequel to NYX's "BEST META QUEST VR GAME"  is an electrifying rogue-like shooter. 

With epic new environments, intoxicating rogue-like progression, and globally competitive leaderboards - this is what VR is really made for!


**RECLAIM A WORLD OVERRUN**

As Marv, the last surviving grapple commando, you’ll use your trusty pistol and grappling hook to battle back the Swarm and save Earth - with style! - while growing stronger and unraveling more of the story with each unique mission to the surface. [media]


**TRANSFORM INTO A LEGENDARY HERO**

With Auggie's help, harness revolutionary Shard Tech to permanently upgrade your skills. Choose among dozens of perks to find the perfect combination and turn the tide of war.[media]



**BUILT FOR REPLAYABILITY**

Every mission brings unexpected challenges as you navigate through the neon-lit ruins of Earth, now a constantly changing battleground. Each encounter with the Swarm is a unique experience, with tactics and strategies evolving to match your growing skills. [media]

**SIGNATURE SMOOTH GRAPPLING SYSTEM**

Swarm’s Signature Smooth Grappling System turns you into a dynamic pendulum; master the art of building momentum by swooping close to the ground and timing your swings to perfection.  [media]

Intense. Demanding. Exhilarating.

**This is SWARM 2.**



[media]

With epic new environments, intoxicating rogue-like progression, and globally competitive leaderboards - this is what VR is really made for!


**RECLAIM A WORLD OVERRUN**

As Marv, the last surviving grapple commando, you’ll use your trusty pistol and grappling hook to battle back the Swarm and save Earth - with style! - while growing stronger and unraveling more of the story with each unique mission to the surface. ![{"height":720,"type":"video","width":1280}](https://scontent-fra3-2.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.7195-25/39031569_1159677598472976_810858379197661666_n.mp4?_nc_cat=104&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=b20b63&_nc_ohc=cZK8BKdj-FYQ7kNvwFhB_zw&_nc_oc=AdmCu12PWtHUdIu_5kWnBiIJdNQG3yahBr_ZhH3DEPonOAo8ZhJ5yvpMSthNocwT10g&_nc_zt=28&_nc_ht=scontent-fra3-2.oculuscdn.com&_nc_gid=5gCvc2RU9gIhpWiTQwPXxw&oh=00_Afu219INTw53fp1sTa4clCWEfZjY0rGp-Qpl_FdcneVg0g&oe=6995AB16)


**TRANSFORM INTO A LEGENDARY HERO**

With Auggie's help, harness revolutionary Shard Tech to permanently upgrade your skills. Choose among dozens of perks to find the perfect combination and turn the tide of war.![{"height":720,"type":"video","width":1280}](https://scontent-fra5-2.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.7195-25/75439601_1283604596339092_1626885398679824555_n.mp4?_nc_cat=106&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=b20b63&_nc_ohc=O0Vaqmwig48Q7kNvwGqOK0k&_nc_oc=AdlsqE_ZuqJX82Di-6bew1hxQymawj8ddGnsJ1fO28IkPtQcJWBrlhSQA626FOuCZXY&_nc_zt=28&_nc_ht=scontent-fra5-2.oculuscdn.com&_nc_gid=5gCvc2RU9gIhpWiTQwPXxw&oh=00_AfuShpf426j8o9lGa0p95yRYndlFDDIwOQiFXc1wfeNX3w&oe=6995B72C)



**BUILT FOR REPLAYABILITY**

Every mission brings unexpected challenges as you navigate through the neon-lit ruins of Earth, now a constantly changing battleground. Each encounter with the Swarm is a unique experience, with tactics and strategies evolving to match your growing skills. ![{"height":720,"type":"video","width":1280}](https://scontent-fra5-1.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.7195-25/38982547_414026104680350_1590790586923082496_n.mp4?_nc_cat=102&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=b20b63&_nc_ohc=AXPd_-Atz_oQ7kNvwGT5Dsx&_nc_oc=AdnjrHgafSYSOMq4C-K4NUPFoqsL2zQQhjAKXLxY2MqjNRudTBaVydtbEE7pnkyqFog&_nc_zt=28&_nc_ht=scontent-fra5-1.oculuscdn.com&_nc_gid=5gCvc2RU9gIhpWiTQwPXxw&oh=00_AfunN0dLe_lrjNKKOVpOwN9LZUdil5T3T6q_NcdPkbkVzA&oe=6995A2B2)

**SIGNATURE SMOOTH GRAPPLING SYSTEM**

Swarm’s Signature Smooth Grappling System turns you into a dynamic pendulum; master the art of building momentum by swooping close to the ground and timing your swings to perfection.  ![{"height":720,"type":"video","width":1280}](https://scontent-fra5-1.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.7195-25/57569452_1204316914209794_1314769465083168968_n.mp4?_nc_cat=100&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=b20b63&_nc_ohc=0UHY3NwwvVkQ7kNvwFJTuhR&_nc_oc=AdlEz-RnK6gjsCQYN_gnXYQxCDRYW5pQOP-d4oRippGT1oIaOSqTH0NejgdeGguZME0&_nc_zt=28&_nc_ht=scontent-fra5-1.oculuscdn.com&_nc_gid=5gCvc2RU9gIhpWiTQwPXxw&oh=00_Aft4waleqQ1O8MVgoKcJ2nNeMeQ-98Dem2P1jArhHuCguQ&oe=6995A4CC)

Intense. Demanding. Exhilarating.

**This is SWARM 2.**
